thread.section_title: Embassy Suites by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport (SFO) - Waterfront - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Burlingame, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location is Fantastic
thread.title_full: Location is Fantastic - Review of Embassy Suites by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport (SFO) - Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: louisepE2490BO
title: Location is Fantastic
text:
The hotels location was amazing. It is facing the bay and you see all the airplanes approaching the runway. My favorite was I was able to walk and run along the bay.
Breakfast was delicious . The entire hotel was clean and staff were professional and accomodating.
I would go back with my family again next trip to San Francisco.
